official_title: A bill to include power-operated wheelchairs as a type of durable medical equipment for which payment may be made under title XVIII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to expand the coverage of health services to include power-operated wheelchairs.

titles.title: A bill to include power-operated wheelchairs as a type of durable medical equipment for which payment may be made under title XVIII of the Social Security Act.
